column1: Scizor, a red insectoid Pokémon with large metallic pincers, stands in a defensive stance.
Mega Scizor, the powered-up form of Scizor, displays its enhanced crimson armor and enlarged, serrated pincers.
A water color image of Scizor, a red insectoid Pokémon with black outer circles and yellow inner circles on the pincers, in a neutral stance.
A digital model of Scizor, a red insectoid Pokémon with its back insect wings out, in an attacking stance.
A shiny variant of Scizor, with a green, metallic body and crab like pincers, in a neutral stance.
A digital model of Scizor, a Pokémon with a three pronged head, on a blue, digital background
A high resolution sprite of a small version of Scizor, a red insectoid Pokémon with black markings on the abdomen
An image of a Scizor, with two pointed, claw like toes on each foot, from the Pokémon anime

An image of Scizor from the Pokémon anime in a battlefield with a leafy background
A shiny Scizor, recognizable by its green metallic exterior, in a sleeping stance
A gray trading card of a bug/steel type pokemon, Scizor, with a red metallic exterior, large pincers and outstretched insect wings
A gray trading card of a Shiny Scizor with a white background with a pattern of yellow, hollowed stars
A shiny Scizor, a green insectoid Pokémon with large metallic pincers, stands in a defensive stance.
A Pokémon with a reflective, red exoskeleton and wings in an attacking stance, known as Scizor

The powerful, bug/steel Pokémon with a red, insectoid body attacking in front of a blue, space like background

Scizor in a traditional Japanese hat holding two katanas in a digital bamboo forest
A shiny Scizor standing next to a shiny Mega Scizor, both with lime green, metallic exteriors, with the Pokémon Go logo in the top left
A silver trading card with a full art of a shiny Pokémon, with markings on its pincers that are light blue external circles with a yellow inner circle

Mega Scizor, a stronger version of Scizor with black, samurai like armor on the head and legs, on a black background
